newsitem.title: EGYPT: Egypt buys 45,000T vegoils at $535.85-$537.5 - trade.
newsitem.headline: Egypt buys 45,000T vegoils at $535.85-$537.5 - trade.

text.p: Egypt bought a total of 45,000 tonnes of sunflower and/or soybean oil on Wednesday at $535.85 and $537.50 per tonne for delivery in November and December, international exporters said.
They said all prices were C+F and the shipment was divided as follows -
-- 20,000 tonnes of sunflower oil at $535.85 from Atlantic shippers for delivery before November 30.
-- 15,000 tonnes of sunflower oil at $537.50 from Cargill for delivery in the first half of December.
-- 10,000 tonnes of sunflower or soybean oil (buyers option) at $537.50 from Cargill for delivery in the first half of December. --Miral Fahmy +202 578 3290/91
